references.paper_title: Long code arena: a set of benchmarks for long-context code models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LongCodeArena benchmark, which is the primary evaluation benchmark used in the paper, making it highly important for evaluating the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Babilong: Testing the limits of LLMs with long context reasoning-in-a-haystack
references.reason: This paper investigates the limitations of LLMs with long context, which directly motivates the approach of this paper to search for plans that only utilize a small part of the repository.

references.paper_title: Codenav: Beyond tool-use to using real-world codebases with llm agents
references.reason: This paper explores the code-use paradigm, which is closely related to the problem addressed by the present paper.

references.paper_title: Planning in natural language improves llm search for code generation
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of plan-based approaches for code generation, which is highly relevant to the proposed approach.
This paper introduces AlphaCode, a system that utilizes test-time search for code generation, which serves as an important related work to the search-based approach proposed in this paper.
